title: Motivational
twitts:
“No matter how slow the progress feels, moving forward is still winning.”

“Small habits done daily create results that motivation alone never can.”

“I remind myself why I started whenever quitting feels easier.”

“Consistency today builds confidence tomorrow.”

title: Life Lessons
twitts:
“Your comfort zone will never introduce you to your potential.”

“Growth begins the moment you choose courage over fear.”

“Be patient with yourself — progress is not always loud.”

title: Success
twitts: “Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.”\n\n“Dreams work only when you do.
